name: Notes (itch) (MoonMoth)
description:
A mystory solving game where you are a P.I.  and you receive several coded notes (outside of the main game executable), these notes  were written by murder victims. Use them along with the ingame search engine to find out who is the murderer. 

This is my first game jam and I went really ambisous with the project many feachers I wanted to add were cut due to time constraints. but I am still happy with how it came out, and I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it.

If you find any bugs or have any kind of feedback either post it in the comments or tweet me @MohammedShwarib. all feedback is welcome.
